lead_paragraph: The police said the two brothers were aiming at a nearby driver when they shot Nykea Aldridge, a young mother pushing a stroller on a sidewalk.

headline.print_headline: 2 Brothers Are Held in Killing in Chicago
headline.main: 2 Brothers on Parole Killed Dwyane Wade’s Cousin, Chicago Police Say

snippet: The police said the two brothers were aiming at a nearby driver when they shot Nykea Aldridge, a young mother pushing a stroller on a sidewalk....
abstract: Chicago police charge brothers Darwin Sorrells Jr and Derren Sorrells with murder of Nykea Aldridge, shot while out pushing her baby in stroller and reportedly not target of South Side shooting; both men are felons on parole; Aldridge is cousin of NBA player Dwyane Wade.
